website_summaries.verdict: The Vans Suede SK8-Hi skate shoe stays true to its roots as it is buttressed by a fully-padded collar which keeps the ankle protected from impact and blows. Its entire upper gets wrapped with durable suede which prevents it from getting damaged easily.Most reviewers lauded the sufficient amount of comfort and protection this sneaker gives which made it their go-to style year round. While a few experienced minor flaws regarding arch support and quality, most wearers are captivated by this style and consider it a worthy purchase.
pros: The Vans Suede SK8-Hi sneaker won the hearts of numerous buyers due to its durability
Heaps of testers were gratified with how comfortable this lifestyle sneaker is
Few noted that the tongue offers added comfort on the instep
A consumer highly rated this sneaker as its structure does not pose any discomfort on the metatarsals
A significant number of reviewers appreciated the style of this high-top suede sneaker as they found it fitting for work and during off duty
Several reviewers stated that this timeless black suede is easy to match with any wardrobe
This sneaker hit the mark once again according to lots of Vans loyalists who found it very affordable
Most purchasers approvingly commended this shoe to their friends, colleagues, and relatives
Some skaters considered this as their favorite Vans style as it comes with a heavy duty façade and delivers excellent
Many skaters are contented with the sufficient ankle support provided by the padded collar
This sneaker received tons of compliments from satisfied buyers because of its excellent craftsmanship
This sturdy suede variety is worth the extra dollars, according to buyers who approved of its style and quality
cons: Few buyers would have appreciated it more if it had better arch support
A small number of users mentioned that the suede material used in earlier versions is of better quality than the one in this model
Its suede body easily catches dirt, according to some

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! And such good quality. The suede in the outside is gorgeous, with the leather vans accent. Also, the inside of the ankle portion is leather too! I know these will last! Would definitely buy again! The picture I posted is of the shoes after being worn several times, and including rainy weather! They were in pristine condition when received!
customer_reviews.author: Abigayle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fit perfect, look great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing vans for almost 30 years, so it was a given that I would wear them to get married in. They weren’t my first choice but ended up being perfect. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Costello

customer_reviews.title: Flat type shoe. supportive for the ankles
customer_reviews.text: Petty decent shoe for the price. please check your products before shipping. I have different size shoe laces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Teen Sneaker, 2 Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe. More comfortable than the converse. We will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: jsmegkat

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! My teen was very happy with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! My teen was very happy with this gift! They look great on him they came just in time for Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Nice condition (new)
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Nice condition (new). The box was a bit battered but the shows were in perfect condition

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my 16 year old son and he loves them!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be able to order the exact ones he ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes! Nice to be able to order the exact ones he wanted and get them in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Doran

customer_reviews.title: I loved these shoes when I was a kid and now ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes when I was a kid and now my son is wearing them and he loves them too! These are his goto shoes over all other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Pearmund

customer_reviews.title: Value-priced Vans; Perfect look.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son! Great price for Vans, way cheaper than at the Vans store.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves them
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple of scuffs in the suede that are pretty obvious and do not brush out
customer_reviews.text: My pair came with a couple of scuffs in the suede that are pretty obvious and do not brush out. The suede finish is very inconsistent, there are areas in the shoe that feel and look rough. The attached photo shows how they came out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: I wasnt sure which size to get because i was ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt sure which size to get because i was worried that they might be too small but i picked my actual size, 8 1/2 and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: $39 Vans!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal for these brand new Vans. Super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: SeXiBLaCkMaMi

product_meta.title: Vans SK8-Hi Classic Unisex-Adults Hi Top Lace-up Sneaker
product_meta.description: The lightweight uppers feature lace-up design, the Vans Sk8-Hi features a cushioned under-heel for comfort, a reinforced toe to withstand wear and tear, and a padded collar with support and flexibility. The iconic Vans waffle outsole provides added grip.
feature_bullets: Perforated upper for healthy inner climate
